questions.question: What are your operating hours?
questions.answer: We are open from 11:00 AM to 10:00 PM, Monday to Sunday.

questions.question: Do you offer vegetarian options?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a variety of delicious vegetarian dishes on our menu.

questions.question: What type of cuisine do you serve?
questions.answer: We specialize in serving Italian cuisine, with a wide range of pasta, pizzas, and more.

questions.question: Can I make a reservation?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We encourage reservations to ensure we have a table ready for you.

questions.question: Do you provide home delivery?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer home delivery services within a certain radius. Please check with us for delivery availability to your location.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept cash, credit cards, and digital wallets like Apple Pay and Google Pay.

questions.question: Is there parking available?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a dedicated parking area for our restaurant patrons.

questions.question: Are you kid-friendly?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We welcome families with children and have a special kids' menu.

questions.question: Do you have any ongoing promotions?
questions.answer: Yes, we frequently run promotions and discounts. Please visit our website or contact us directly to know about the current offers.

questions.question: Can you accommodate food allergies?
questions.answer: Yes, we do our best to accommodate food allergies. Please inform our staff about any allergies when placing your order.

questions.question: Do you have a kids' play area?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a kids' play area with toys and games to keep the little ones entertained.

questions.question: What are your best-selling dishes?
questions.answer: Some of our best-selling dishes include our signature lasagna, wood-fired pizzas, and tiramisu for dessert.

questions.question: Is there a dress code for the restaurant?
questions.answer: There is no strict dress code, but we recommend smart-casual attire for a pleasant dining experience.

questions.question: Can I host private events or parties at your restaurant?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We have event spaces available for private gatherings, parties, and special occasions. Please contact us in advance to make arrangements.

questions.question: Are you pet-friendly?
questions.answer: While we love pets, we only allow service animals inside the restaurant.

questions.question: Do you offer gluten-free options?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a selection of gluten-free dishes to cater to our gluten-intolerant guests.

questions.question: What is the recommended way to make a reservation?
questions.answer: You can make a reservation by calling us directly or using our online reservation system on the website.

questions.question: Do you have outdoor seating?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a lovely outdoor patio where you can enjoy your meal in a beautiful setting.

questions.question: Can I customize the ingredients in my dish?
questions.answer: Certainly! Our chefs can accommodate reasonable requests to customize your dish based on your preferences.

questions.question: Is your restaurant wheelchair accessible?
questions.answer: Yes, our restaurant is fully wheelchair accessible to ensure all our guests can have a comfortable dining experience.

questions.question: Do you offer a happy hour?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a happy hour with discounted drinks and appetizers. Happy hour timings are from 4:00 PM to 6:00 PM, Monday to Friday.

questions.question: What precautions are you taking regarding COVID-19?
questions.answer: We prioritize the safety and health of our guests and staff. We follow all the necessary COVID-19 safety guidelines, including regular sanitization, social distancing, and mask-wearing for staff.

questions.question: Do you have a bar area?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a fully stocked bar offering a wide selection of alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages.

questions.question: Can I see the menu online?
questions.answer: Absolutely! You can view our menu on our website or download it as a PDF to check out our delicious offerings.

questions.question: Are reservations required for large groups?
questions.answer: Reservations are highly recommended for large groups to ensure we can accommodate everyone comfortably.

questions.question: Do you offer a lunch buffet?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a lunch buffet option available on weekdays from 12:00 PM to 2:30 PM, offering a variety of dishes to choose from.

questions.question: Can I bring my own cake for a celebration?
questions.answer: Certainly! We allow guests to bring their own celebration cakes. However, please inform us in advance, and we may charge a small cake-cutting fee.

questions.question: Is there a senior citizen discount?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a special discount for senior citizens on weekdays. Please inquire with our staff for more details.

questions.question: Do you have a loyalty program?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a loyalty program where you can earn points for each visit and redeem them for discounts on future meals.

questions.question: What is your corkage fee?
questions.answer: Our corkage fee is $15 per bottle of wine if you choose to bring your own wine to enjoy with your meal.

questions.question: Are gift cards available for purchase?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We offer gift cards that make for perfect presents for your loved ones to enjoy a delightful dining experience.

questions.question: Can I host a business meeting at your restaurant?
questions.answer: Certainly! Our restaurant provides a conducive environment for business meetings, and we can assist with any audiovisual equipment you may need.

questions.question: Are there vegan options on your menu?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a selection of delicious vegan dishes to cater to our vegan guests.

questions.question: Do you offer live music or entertainment?
questions.answer: Yes, we occasionally have live music or entertainment events. Please check our website or social media for updates on upcoming events.
